title: Jamf Connect Login OpenID Connect General Preferences
description: Jamf Connect Login OpenID Connect General Preference

OIDCNewPassword.title: Create New Local Password
OIDCNewPassword.description: If set to true, this key prompts users to create a new password for their new local account. If set to false, this key prompts users to re-enter their network password, which also becomes the local account password. This ensures a user's network and local password are synced during user creation

OIDCDefaultLocal.title: Use local authentication only
OIDCDefaultLocal.description: When set to true, Jamf Connect Login will use local authentication by default rather than cloud authentication, which ensures users can always log in without a network connection

OIDCAdmin.title: OpenID Connect Admin Groups
OIDCAdmin.description: Specifies which user groups become local admins during account creation. You can specify one user group as a string or multiple user groups in an array of strings

OIDCAdminAttribute.title: OpenID Connect Admin Attribute
OIDCAdminAttribute.description: Specifies what attribute stored in an ID token is used to determine if a user is created as a standard or admin local user. By default, Jamf Connect Login will read the groups attribute for any values specified with the OIDCAdmin preference key

OIDCIgnoreAdmin.title: Ignore OpenID Connect Attributes
OIDCIgnoreAdmin.description: When set to true, Jamf Connect Login will ignore any roles that exist in your IdP. This key ensures local user accounts maintain their current status as either an admin or standard account. When set to false or unspecified, Jamf Connect Login will read the OIDCAdmin key for configured roles and will change a local user account status based on any roles in your IdP

OIDCScopes.title: OpenID Connect Scopes
OIDCScopes.description: Specifies custom scopes, which return additional claims in a user’s ID token during authorization. Standard scopes included openid, profile, and offline_access. This key should be configured as a string with space-separated values

OIDCIDTokenPath.title: Path to OpenID Connect Token
OIDCIDTokenPath.description: Specifies the file path that can be used to store a user’s formatted ID token

OIDCIDTokenPathRaw.title: Path to unformatted OpenID Connect Token
OIDCIDTokenPathRaw.description: Specifies the file path that can be used to store a user’s raw ID token

OIDCIgnoreCookies.title: Ignore IDP Cookies
OIDCIgnoreCookies.description: Ignores any cookies stored by the loginwindow

OIDCHideRestart.title: Hide Restart
OIDCHideRestart.description: Hides Restart Button at the Login Window. Undocumented, experimental preference

OIDCHideShutdown.title: Hide Shutdown
OIDCHideShutdown.description: Hides Shutdown Button at the Login Window. Undocumented, experimental preference
